name: Golden Dungeons
description: Golden Dungeons - is a simple hardcore platformer game, the goal to get out of the cave. Try to pass all levels and not die!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7,8,10 Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU Dual Core Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7,8,10 Processor: Core i3 or higher Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Any
